definitions.usage_example: He seems rude, but he is actually very nice.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él parece grosero, pero en realidad es muy amable.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to emphasize that something is true or a fact.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para enfatizar que algo es verdad o un hecho.

definitions.usage_example: Basically, we need more time.
definitions.usage_example_es: Básicamente, necesitamos más tiempo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce the most important or fundamental point.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir el punto más importante o fundamental.

definitions.usage_example: I literally translated the text word for word.
definitions.usage_example_es: Traduje literalmente el texto palabra por palabra.
definitions.usage_context_en: In the exact, literal sense of the words.
definitions.usage_context_es: En el sentido exacto y literal de las palabras.

definitions.usage_example: I was so scared, I literally froze.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estaba tan asustado que literalmente me congelé.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used informally to add strong emphasis (even if not 100% true).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado informalmente para añadir un fuerte énfasis (incluso si no es 100% real).

definitions.usage_example: He is tired. Obviously, he needs sleep.
definitions.usage_example_es: Está cansado. Obviamente, necesita dormir.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a way that is easy to see, understand, or be certain of.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera que es fácil de ver, entender o estar seguro.

definitions.usage_example: Apparently, the meeting was canceled.
definitions.usage_example_es: Aparentemente, la reunión fue cancelada.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to say that something seems true based on what you heard or read.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para decir que algo parece verdad basado en lo que oíste o leíste.

definitions.usage_example: I am not particularly busy today.
definitions.usage_example_es: No estoy particularmente ocupado hoy.
definitions.usage_context_en: More than usual; especially.
definitions.usage_context_es: Más de lo usual; especialmente.

definitions.usage_example: I specifically asked for a green one.
definitions.usage_example_es: Pedí específicamente uno verde.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a way that is exact and detailed.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera que es exacta y detallada.

definitions.usage_example: I generally wake up early.
definitions.usage_example_es: Generalmente me despierto temprano.
definitions.usage_context_en: Usually; in most cases.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usualmente; en la mayoría de los casos.

definitions.usage_example: I normally take the bus.
definitions.usage_example_es: Normalmente tomo el autobús.
definitions.usage_context_en: Under normal or usual conditions; typically.
definitions.usage_context_es: Bajo condiciones normales o usuales; típicamente.

definitions.usage_example: Technically, a tomato is a fruit.
definitions.usage_example_es: Técnicamente, un tomate es una fruta.
definitions.usage_context_en: According to the exact facts or a strict interpretation.
definitions.usage_context_es: Según los hechos exactos o una interpretación estricta.

definitions.usage_example: Frankly, I don't care.
definitions.usage_example_es: Francamente, no me importa.
definitions.usage_context_en: In an open, honest, and direct manner.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera abierta, honesta y directa.

definitions.usage_example: Surprisingly, the test was easy.
definitions.usage_example_es: Sorprendentemente, el examen fue fácil.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a way that causes surprise; unexpectedly.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera que causa sorpresa; inesperadamente.

definitions.usage_example: Additionally, we need to buy milk.
definitions.usage_example_es: Adicionalmente, necesitamos comprar leche.
definitions.usage_context_en: As an extra factor or reason; in addition.
definitions.usage_context_es: Como un factor o razón extra; además.

definitions.usage_example: It costs approximately 10 dollars.
definitions.usage_example_es: Cuesta aproximadamente 10 dólares.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to show that something is close to accurate; about.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para mostrar que algo es cercano a lo exacto; alrededor de.

definitions.usage_example: He is constantly checking his phone.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él está constantemente revisando su teléfono.
definitions.usage_context_en: Continuously over a period of time; always.
definitions.usage_context_es: Continuamente durante un período de tiempo; siempre.

definitions.usage_example: He deliberately broke the glass.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él rompió el vaso a propósito.
definitions.usage_context_en: Consciously and intentionally; on purpose.
definitions.usage_context_es: Consciente e intencionalmente; a propósito.

definitions.usage_example: We frequently visit this park.
definitions.usage_example_es: Visitamos este parque frecuentemente.
definitions.usage_context_en: Regularly or habitually; often.
definitions.usage_context_es: Regularmente o habitualmente; a menudo.

definitions.usage_example: The team is mostly young players.
definitions.usage_example_es: El equipo es mayormente jugadores jóvenes.
definitions.usage_context_en: Mainly; for the most part.
definitions.usage_context_es: Principalmente; en su mayor parte.

definitions.usage_example: Study hard, otherwise you will fail.
definitions.usage_example_es: Estudia duro, de lo contrario reprobarás.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to state the consequence if a condition is not met.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para indicar la consecuencia si no se cumple una condición.

definitions.usage_example: He is quiet, but she is otherwise.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es callado, pero ella es diferente.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a different way; differently.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera diferente; diferentemente.

definitions.usage_example: The meeting starts at 9 AM precisely.
definitions.usage_example_es: La reunión empieza a las 9 AM precisamente.
definitions.usage_context_en: In an exact way; exactly.
definitions.usage_context_es: De manera exacta; exactamente.

definitions.usage_example: The test was relatively easy.
definitions.usage_example_es: El examen fue relativamente fácil.
definitions.usage_context_en: In relation or comparison to something else.
definitions.usage_context_es: En relación o comparación con algo más.

definitions.usage_example: The price increased significantly.
definitions.usage_example_es: El precio aumentó significativamente.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a way that is large or important enough to be noticeable.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera que es lo suficientemente grande o importante como para ser notable.

definitions.usage_example: The sisters dress similarly.
definitions.usage_example_es: Las hermanas visten de forma similar.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a similar way.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera similar.

definitions.usage_example: You must explain it simply.
definitions.usage_example_es: Debes explicarlo simplemente.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a plain or easy-to-understand way.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera llana o fácil de entender.

definitions.usage_example: It is simply a matter of time.
definitions.usage_example_es: Es simplemente una cuestión de tiempo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to mean 'only', 'just', or 'absolutely'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para significar 'solo', 'solamente' o 'absolutamente'.

definitions.usage_example: He is a truly good person.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es una persona verdaderamente buena.
definitions.usage_context_en: In a truthful way; genuinely or really.
definitions.usage_context_es: De una manera veraz; genuinamente o realmente.

definitions.usage_example: This is a commonly used phrase.
definitions.usage_example_es: Esta es una frase comúnmente usada.
definitions.usage_context_en: Very often; by most people.
definitions.usage_context_es: Muy a menudo; por la mayoría de la gente.

definitions.usage_example: It was cold. Nevertheless, he went swimming.
definitions.usage_example_es: Hacía frío. Sin embargo, fue a nadar.
definitions.usage_context_en: In spite of that; nonetheless (a very formal version of 'however').
definitions.usage_context_es: A pesar de eso; no obstante (una versión muy formal de 'however').

definitions.usage_example: The results are bad. Nonetheless, we must continue.
definitions.usage_example_es: Los resultados son malos. No obstante, debemos continuar.
definitions.usage_context_en: In spite of that; nevertheless (also very formal).
definitions.usage_context_es: A pesar de eso; sin embargo (también muy formal).

definitions.usage_example: He is sick; therefore, he will not come.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él está enfermo; por lo tanto, no vendrá.
definitions.usage_context_en: For that reason; consequently (used in formal speech or writing).
definitions.usage_context_es: Por esa razón; consecuentemente (usado en habla o escritura formal).

definitions.usage_example: You cook dinner. Meanwhile, I will set the table.
definitions.usage_example_es: Tú prepara la cena. Mientras tanto, yo pondré la mesa.
definitions.usage_context_en: In the intervening period of time; at the same time.
definitions.usage_context_es: En el período de tiempo intermedio; al mismo tiempo.
